column5: My place is close to 1/2 mile to Medina and the Medina River, 13 miles to Bandera, 27 miles to Kerrville, 50 miles to Fredericksburg, 25 miles to Lost Maples, 39 miles to Garner State Park, great views. Youâ€™ll love because of the friendly people, the viewscoziness, quiet, peaceful, the heart of the hill country . My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, bikers, and families (with kids).
